44fa403e-2c41-42e8-8e85-7d2d3c789133.notes: React to others at +4; -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less

08f15bdd-1ac8-4957-b054-aadf25432066.name: 幸运

88e76da1-5c11-43c9-afcf-403a9c8b0ae9.notes: Bonus to first influence roll made against one or more audience members after a successful performance.

673883aa-1166-4d39-81e0-9bfb310f551f.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

b4c4a5da-25e2-4829-a36f-65e4ae089151.notes: Con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.
